name: Blessing of Courage
desc: The Blessing of Courage grants the character the refinement of willpower, enhancing his bravery and battle skills.

name: Blessing of Shelter
desc: The Blessing of Shelter grants the character exceptional resilience, strengthening defensive capability.

name: Blessing of Benevolence
desc: The Blessing of Benevolence grants the character the resonance with the merciful dawn and knowledge of healing and recovery.

name: Blessing of Miracles
desc: The Blessing of Hope grants the character a chance to pray for hope, stimulating his untapped potential.
